cab.content: (P 829) ' From Viceroy. Foreign and Political Department,. 1699 ' '9t/t February 1921. (Received 10th, 9 ami.) Priority A. 185 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Following from Dobbs, .30 C, dated 9th February : "Tarsi telegraphed to envoy, Teheran, on the 4th, through the envoy, Delhi)informing former, with reference to report; of conversation with Americau Minister,that Afghanistan is ready to enter-into relations with America in any way.which may seem best for her interests."
